Serialized Form

  • Package pacman

    • Class pacman.GameEngine extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • frame

          javax.swing.JFrame frame

        • delay

          int delay
          Controls the speed of the game. The lower the value, the faster the game goes by.

        • running

          boolean running
          A variable that keeps track of whether the game is running or not.

        • width

          int width
          Sets the width of the canvas.

        • height

          int height
          Sets the height of the canvas.

        • state

          int state
          The state that the pacman is in which is used to animate the pacman character.

        • frameCount

          int frameCount
          Keeps track of the numbers of loops the game has executed.

        • animationRate

          int animationRate
          the speed in which the pacman character changes animation. It is inversely proportional to the speed.

        • pause

          boolean pause
          A variable to keep track of whether the game is paused.

        • start

          boolean start
          A variable to check whether the game has began.

        • alive

          boolean alive
          A variable to check if the pacman character is alive.

        • lives

          int lives
          Denotes the number of lives the pacman character has.

        • reset

          boolean reset

        • fontColor

          java.awt.Color fontColor
          The color used for the in game text.

        • pac

          Pacman pac
          An instance of Pacman, containing the character variables and methods.

        • gho1

          Ghost gho1
          An instance of Ghost, containing the character variables and methods for the AI.

        • gho2

          Ghost gho2

        • gho3

          Ghost gho3

        • gho4

          Ghost gho4

        • ghostNum

          int ghostNum
          The number of ghosts present in the game.

        • ghostsX

          int[] ghostsX
          An array of the x positions of the ghosts.

        • ghostsY

          int[] ghostsY
          An array of the y positions of the ghosts.

        • imgLdr

          ImageLoader imgLdr
          An instance of ImageLoader which is in charge of loading the images for all the characters.

        • activeItem

          java.util.LinkedList<E> activeItem
          A linked list of Items that keeps track of the currently active Items.

        • itemStart

          java.util.LinkedList<E> itemStart
          A linked list that keeps track of when the active item was activated

        • timeLimit

          int[] timeLimit
          A decrementing integer that keeps track of how much time left before the player loses.

        • constTimeLimit

          int constTimeLimit
          A constant time limit that is used to reset the timer when the player resets the game.

        • firstGameOver

          boolean firstGameOver
          This variable is changed to false once the bonus time score is added to the total score, to avoid infinitely incrementing the score.

        • out

          java.io.PrintWriter out
          This PrintWriter is used to write score to the server.

        • username

          java.lang.String username
          This is palyer's username.

        • nextLevel

          boolean nextLevel
          This boolean checks if the game should move on to the next level.

        • level

          int level
          Level number

        • grid

          GridReadCreate grid
          An instance of GridReadCreate which represents the grid for the game.

        • lastLevel

          int lastLevel
          Decides which level is the last level.

        • totalScore

          int totalScore
          Keeps track of the total score among all levels.

    • Class pacman.GridReadCreate extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • pointWorth

          int pointWorth
          How many points each dot is worth.

        • totalDots

          int totalDots
          Number of dots in the grid.
